    • Method Detail

      • purgeFile

        public static java.lang.String purgeFile(java.nio.file.Path textFilePath,
                                         boolean allowNumbers)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Reads every line of a file, removing HTML tags, multiple spaces and numbers if allowNumbers is set to true. Returns a String with the contents of the file filtered.
        Parameters:
        textFilePath - The path to the file to be purged.
        allowNumbers - If numbers should not be removed from the original file.
        Returns:
        A String with the file contents filtered.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there's a fault while manipulating the file.

      • applyNEDClassifier

        public static void applyNEDClassifier(java.lang.String corpusPath,
                                      java.lang.String outputFolder,
                                      boolean allowNumbers)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      java.lang.ClassCastException,
                                      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        For each file on corpusPath, the following procedure is done: 1. For each file, a corresponding one, with the same name, is created on a folder on outputFolder. If this folder doesn't exist, then it is created; 2. For each file on corpusPath folder, HTML tags, extra spaces and numbers allowNumbers is set to false are removed; 3. Stanford's NER Classifiers attempts to label each word on one of the categories: Person, Location or Organization. If it succeeds, the words is annotated using the format [word]_[class], otherwise it is left as it is; 4. The word, either classified or not is written on a new line on the file on corpusPath; 
        All the files on the source folder MUST be text files.
        If outputFolder doesn't exist, it is created during this function execution.
        Parameters:
        corpusPath - The path to the corpus location.
        outputFolder - The path, including the folder name, to the directory that will hold the annotated files.
        allowNumbers - If true numbers won't be removed from the files.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an IO fault.
        java.lang.ClassCastException - NER thrown exception.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - NER thrown exception.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
